div.div: Monthly fishery production by species in floodplain lakes.
div.p: Monthly fishery production by species in floodplain lakes near the fishery grounds of Óbidos, Santarém and Monte Alegre, from January 1993 to December 2004. (HYP) Hypophthalmus marginatus and H. edentatus, (LIP) Liposarcus pardalis, (PRO) Prochilodus nigricans, (PIF) Pimelodina flavipinnis, (PAC) Plagioscion spp. and Pachypops spp. (PSE), Pseudoplatystoma fasciatum and P. tigrinum, (COL) Colossoma macropomum.
